name: RealTimePackageMonitoringandTracking
description: Track and monitor packages in real time using wireless sensors (Telosb MOTES). Sensor boards send informations to a base station(Android Application) and the base station sends the data to a server(Java) using 3G/4G/GSM/WI-FI. A web application(php) will retrieve the data from MongoDB(No-SQL Database) to visualize the package related data in Google Maps and in various graphical formats.
